amendatorysection.para: The county assessor, before entering upon the duties of the office, shall take and subscribe an oath to perform well, faithfully, and impartially such duties and shall execute a bond as required by Chapter 11, article 1.

crossreference.para: For form of oath, see section 11-101.
For other provisions relating to bond, see Chapter 11, article 1.

annotation.para: Elected county officials are required to give individual official bonds. Blanket bond is not sufficient. Foote v. County of Adams, 163 Neb. 406, 80 N.W.2d 179 (1956).
